inclusion.criterion: Primary diagnosis: eating disorder according to DSM IV Criteria based on diagnostic interview
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Participated in at least three failed specialized eating disorder treatments
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Having the mental capacity to make provide informed consent to research participation
inclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of abdominal pain and vomiting, but the lab results are remarkable for leukocytosis, urea, high CRP, high amylase, and Glc level. Cross-sectional imaging was negative for obstructive pancreatitis.
